scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp styles.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../markdownbrain-plugin.zip .
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

scripts-description.dev: Build and watch to ../vaults/test/.obsidian/plugins/markdownbrain for integration testing
